metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Sonic Colors - Tropical Resort Act 1 has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty and below-average scores in Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Sonic Colors - Tropical Resort Act 1 has sections analyzed in the following keys: E Mixolydian,  and E Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
